metadata.title: CVE-2023-23600 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Per origin notification permissions were being stored in a way that didn'ttake into account what browsing context the permission was granted in. Thislead to the possibility of notifications to be displayed during differentbrowsing sessions.
*This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox <109.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
